title: Girls & Panzer Movie Specials

synonyms: Girls und Panzer der Film: Arisu War!
Girls und Panzer: Fushou Akiyama Yukari no Sensha Kouza
alternative_titles.en: Girls und Panzer der Film Specials
alternative_titles.ja: ガールズ＆パンツァー 劇場版

synopsis: Specials included with the Blu-ray and DVD releases of Girls & Panzer Movie. Arisu War! (愛里寿・ウォー！) takes place after the events of the movie and Akiyama Yukari no Sensha Kouza (秋山優花里の戦車講座) are another two standard Yukari tank corner explanation videos.
